_dbDriver: {% if cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'mysql' %}pymysql{% elif cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'posgresql' %}psycopg2{% elif cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'mssql' %}pyodbc{% else %}sqlite{% endif %}
_db_port: {% if cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'mysql' %}3306{% elif cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'posgresql' %}5432{% elif cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'mssql' %}1433{% endif %}
_dbConn: {% if cookiecutter.dbDialect == 'sqlite' %}sqlite:///app.db{% else %}{{ cookiecutter.dbDialect }}+{{ cookiecutter._dbDriver }}://{{ cookiecutter.db_user }}:{{ cookiecutter.db_pass }}@{{ cookiecutter.db_host }}/{{ cookiecutter.db_name }}{% endif %}
